doc:
Steve James (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_James_(actor) 0 Steve James (February 19, 1952 – December 18, 1993) was an American actor, stunt performer and martial artist. He starred mostly in action films such as the American Ninja series, The Delta Force (1986), The Exterminator (1980), and Enter the Game of Death (1978). James also portrayed Kung Fu Joe in the 1988 comedy/spoof film I'm Gonna Git You Sucka, and its 1990 television pilot spinoff Hammer, Slammer, Slade. Steve_James ( February_19_,_1952 – December_18_,_1993 ) was an_American_actor , stunt_performer and martial_artist . He starred mostly in action_films such_as the_American_Ninja_series , The_Delta_Force_(_1986_) , The_Exterminator_(_1980_) , and Enter the_Game of Death ( 1978_) . James also portrayed Kung_Fu_Joe in the_1988_comedy/spoof_film I 'm Gon na Git You Sucka , and its_1990_television_pilot_spinoff_Hammer_,_Slammer_,_ .
